name: Mykhailo Kulyk
meta_title: PHP Developer | Skilled in Legacy Code, Modern Frameworks, CMS Integration | Full-Stack Skills: PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, SCSS/CSS
title: Full Stack & Backend PHP Developer
summary: Experienced Full-Stack PHP developer with a strong focus on delivering results and maintaining high standards throughout the project lifecycle. I consistently follow defined priorities and tasks, and strive to write clean, maintainable code while effectively understanding and working with code written by others.
purpose: I am looking for a long-term position in a stable, technically mature team where I can leverage my expertise, broaden my technology stack, solve complex technical challenges, and deliver long-term value to my future employer.

skills.Backend: PHP 7/8 (OOP, SOLID, MVC, Design Patterns), Yii2, Laravel, Symfony;
skills.Frontend: HTML5, SCSS/CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), Vue3, jQuery, Bootstrap;
skills.Server & Deployment: Linux, (CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu), NGINX, bash, deployment processes;
skills.Additional: Basic, technical SEO, Google Ads management.

experience.description: Delivered full-cycle development for client projects using PHP Frameworks (Laravel 8, Symfony 5/6) and CMS platforms (PrestaShop 8, Joomla 4). Handled backend and frontend tasks from planning to deployment.

responsibilities.Client Collaboration: Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and provide technical solutions;
responsibilities.Project Development: Developed and maintained custom web applications (PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, jQuery);
responsibilities.Custom Extensions: Built modules, plugins, and components for PrestaShop and Joomla;
responsibilities.Google Ads: Managed and optimized Google Ads campaigns for several clients.

experience.position: Head of Technology | B2B E-commerce Platform Development | Startup
experience.description: Led the technical development and business implementation of a B2B e-commerce platform focused on price comparison and wholesale/retail optimization. Built the platform from scratch together with a team, translating evolving business needs into technical solutions.

responsibilities.Team Management: Recruited the initial development team and worked closely with developers throughout the project;
responsibilities.Tech Leadership: Worked on system architecture: migrations, codebase and project structure (PHP/Yii2, Symfony components, MySQL);
responsibilities.Agile Management: Oversaw key project phases and cross-functional collaboration; implemented agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban);
responsibilities.Server & Deployment: Wrote code, conducted code reviews via Bitbucket, and handled code deployment and CentOS server administration;
responsibilities.Database Optimization: Optimized complex MySQL queries to improve system performance and efficiency.

experience.position: Full-Stack Web Developer | Founder of a Web Studio
experience.description: Founded and developed a local web studio that delivered full-cycle web development, from technical concept to maintenance and scaling of corporate websites. Specialized in CMS platforms (PrestaShop, Joomla, WordPress) and e-commerce, and completed 250+ projects across various industries.

responsibilities.Full-Cycle Development: Built and maintained backend and frontend systems;
responsibilities.Custom Coding: Created responsive HTML templates and developed custom modules/plugins (PHP, JavaScript, MySQL);
responsibilities.Team Collaboration: Collaborated with designers, content managers, and SEO specialists;
responsibilities.Client Engagement: Translated business requirements into technical solutions and built long-term client relationships;
responsibilities.Technical support: Provided technical support, troubleshooting, and optimization;
responsibilities.Support & SEO: Managed and optimized Google Ads campaigns to enhance client visibility.

experience.description: Worked as a freelance web developer focused on frontend development and CMS integration for small businesses and personal projects.

responsibilities.CMS Integration: Integrated and customized templates, themes for WordPress and Joomla.

education.institution: East European University of Economics and Management
education.description: Bachelor's program in Digital Economics combines IT and business disciplines. The curriculum includes programming, web development, database design, and data analytics, alongside business process management, project planning, and digital transformation strategy.
